The directories here are externals in my original svn based structure. They are pointing to the following repositories:

<dir>   <repository url>    <revision>

pygal   https://github.com/never-eat-yellow-snow/pygal/trunk/pygal  795
acplugins4python    https://github.com/minolin/acplugins/trunk/acplugins4python/acplugins4python    181
